main.name: José Ramón Martínez Riveiro
main.description: Software Engineer. MSc in Computer Science
main.bio: I'm interested in Software Architecture and Cloud Computing. I seek to expand my knowledge of Cloud Computing, dealing with scalability and maintainability problems. As software engineer, i define myself as tidy and methodical, focused on clean code, design patterns and algorithmic.

education.school: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Mark of Final Master Degree Project: 10
Bilingual: English. Software Engineering Mention. Mark of Final University Degree Project: 10 (with honors)

work.title: Analyst programmer
work.description: Digitization program for the Ministry of Agriculture (JCCM). Systems digitalization projects, fraud detection and wine traceability improved by blockchain. Techs: Angular 13, Spring Boot, Oracle SQL, Cucumber, Vagrant, Subversion, CI/CD.

work.title: Substitute teacher
work.description: Substitute professor for the subject Software Systems Quality at the University Degree of Computer Science.

work.title: Researcher/Research support staff
work.description: Researched in interactive systems, improving recommendations for breast cancer patients using audio and images. System evaluated by final users.

work.title: Research Fellow | Software Engineering
work.description: Designed and implemented a software system (two hybrid app and a backend cloud serverless) to improve the life quality of breast cancer patients. Techs: Ionic, Angular, AWS (API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, Cognito, Amplify), Git, GitHub, GitHub Actions and Serverless Framework. Designed and implemented a content manager web app for the European project LanGuide. Techs: NodeJS, MongoDB, PUG, Git and PM2.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented a monitoring web app based on domestic sensors. Techs: Angular 9, Amazon Cognito, Git.
